message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value of the product, $12,000 is a bit higher than my budget allows.  I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it.  Let me know if that's acceptable.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to compromise. I can do $11,500 for the product. It's a fair price considering its value and the benefits it can bring to your business.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to come down in price. However, $11,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm firm at $10,500. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and allows us both to make a reasonable deal. Let me know if you're willing to accept this offer.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go down to $10,500. I can do $11,000 for the product, which is still a good compromise considering its value. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise further. However, $11,000 is still a little outside my budget. Let's meet in the middle again. I'm willing to pay $10,750.  This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product while also allowing me to stay within my budget.  I hope we can reach an agreement on this offer.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go down to $10,750. I can do $10,900 for the product, which is still a good compromise considering its value. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers again.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to keep negotiating.  While $10,900 is closer to my budget, I'm still hoping to find a price that works for both of us. I'm prepared to offer $10,800.  This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product while allowing me to stay within my financial limits. I hope you'll accept this final offer and we can finalize the deal.

I understand that you're trying to find a price that works for both of us, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go down to $10,800. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can do $10,950 for the product, which is still a good price considering its value. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last offers again.
